QuestData.Title: Gatekeepers of Auchindoun
QuestData.Description: I was taken captive by the Iron Horde when they raided our caravan en route to Auchindoun.$B$BI escaped, but these spirits won't let me through to join my fellow Sunsworn until someone defeats them in combat!$B$BPlease, will you help me defeat them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Vindicator Dalu and Soulbinder Halaari in combat.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. I am truly in your debt.$B$BWhen I fulfill my duties to Lady Liadrin I will come find you.
